overview: Arif, a deaf 1 5 year old boy struggles to live a normal life in a community where he is discriminated against. Raised by an over protective single father, he tries to shelter him from the harsh reality of the world. His father withdrew him from school at an early age but now, he wants more than anything to go back to school and live a normal life like his peers. Things change when a 17 year old, Chong, moved into his neighbourhood. They formed an unlikely friendship and bond in unpredictable ways, in this heartwarming coming of age drama of self empowerment, friendship, and family.
title: Pekak
